original_text: It is God who supplies seeds for the farmer to plant. It is God who supplies bread for food. God will help you in the same way. He will give you plenty of things so that you can help other people. You will be like a farmer who plants many seeds. And God will cause those seeds to grow. There will be many good results from the help that you give to other people. That will be like a great harvest.
korean_text: 심는 자에게 씨와 먹을 양식을 주시는 이가 너희 심을 것을 주사 풍성하게 하시고 너희 의의 열매를 더하게 하시리니

sentences.original_text: It is God who supplies seeds
It is God who supplies bread for food
God will help you in the same way
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 같은 방식으로 당신을 도우실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will give you plenty of things
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신에게 풍성한 것들을 주실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: so that you can help other people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 다른 사람들을 도울 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: You will be like a farmer
And God will cause those seeds to grow
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님은 그 씨앗들이 자라게 하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: There will be many good results
from the help that you give to other people
That will be like a great harvest
